member.name: M:KernelBuilderExtensions.WithCompletionService(Microsoft.SemanticKernel.KernelBuilder,KernelSettings)
member.summary: Adds a text completion service to the list. It can be either an OpenAI or Azure OpenAI backend service.

member.name: M:KernelSettings.LoadSettings
member.summary: Load the kernel settings from settings.json if the file exists and if not attempt to use user secrets.

member.name: M:KernelSettings.FromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Load the kernel settings from the specified configuration file if it exists.

member.name: M:KernelSettings.FromUserSecrets
member.summary: Load the kernel settings from user secrets.
